home.title: First Impression AI
home.subtitle: Discover your first impression with just one photo!

phrase1.core: The type that naturally inspires trust in a team
phrase1.explain: A sense of responsibility and reliability is felt.

phrase2.core: Someone whose presence is felt even without speaking
phrase2.explain: Possesses a heavy sense of trust that fills the space.

phrase3.core: An impression of someone who will finish what they start
phrase3.explain: Strong will and sincerity are seen in their eyes.

phrase4.core: A face that makes you feel at ease just being near
phrase4.explain: Shares a calm and stable energy with those around.

phrase5.core: The type you can rely on in critical moments
phrase5.explain: A firmness that won't easily waver is felt.

phrase6.core: Quiet but will firmly hold the center
phrase6.explain: Will silently support the team with inner strength.

phrase7.core: An aura of trustworthiness even at first glance
phrase7.explain: An honest and upright aura creates this impression.

phrase8.explain: Because carefulness is evident in their words and actions.

phrase9.core: A face that seems to keep promises well
phrase9.explain: Gives trust that they will definitely keep their word.

phrase10.core: The type who remains calmer in urgent situations
phrase10.explain: Likely to judge situations rationally and wisely.

phrase11.core: Someone who shows rather than tells
phrase11.explain: Their hidden reliability beneath silence is charming.

phrase12.core: The type that would be missed if absent from the team
phrase12.explain: Because your presence adds stability to the team.

phrase13.core: An impression of someone who would be a standard when decisions are needed
phrase13.explain: Likely to have clear and rational thoughts.

phrase14.explain: Just being with them makes the surroundings calm.

phrase15.core: The type one would seek advice from
phrase15.explain: Likely to give wise answers with deep thought.

phrase16.core: Someone who looks after those around them well
phrase16.explain: A warm and delicate heart shows on their face.

phrase17.core: A style of building trust steadily
phrase17.explain: Someone whose true worth emerges over time.

phrase18.core: An impression of someone you can feel secure working with
phrase18.explain: Likely to do their part meticulously and sincerely.

phrase19.explain: Possesses a charm that offers both comfort and reliability.

phrase20.core: Someone who makes you feel supported when they're nearby
phrase20.explain: Gives trust that they will stand by you in any situation.

phrase21.core: A face easy to talk to even at first glance
phrase21.explain: A comfortable and gentle impression makes them approachable.

phrase22.core: The type who brightens the mood instantly when they smile
phrase22.explain: A bright smile seems to make everyone around happy.

phrase23.core: An impression that naturally draws favor

phrase24.core: Someone who seems easy to be with

phrase25.core: The type that softens the atmosphere between people

phrase26.core: A face that makes you want to look again

phrase27.core: An impression of someone you'd quickly become close with

phrase28.core: The type who wouldn't feel awkward even at a first meeting

phrase29.core: A face that seems to be good at sensing others' feelings

phrase30.core: The type with many subtle appealing points
phrase30.explain: The more you get to know them, the more new charms emerge.

phrase31.explain: A face that makes you want to share daily life.

phrase32.core: An impression of someone you'd laugh a lot with

phrase33.core: The type that naturally attracts people
phrase33.explain: Likely to have many people around due to their comfortable charm.

phrase99.core: 감정 기복을 잘 받아줄 것 같은 얼굴
